block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey
Trenton Pension and Health Benefits Review Commission. Friday at 10 a.m. Division of Pensions and Benefits, 50 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County
Atlantic City Planning Board. Wednesday at 10 a.m. City Hall of Atlantic City, 1301 Bacharach Boulevard. (609) 347-5404.
Burlington County

Mount Laurel Township Council. Monday at 8 p.m. Mount Laurel Municipal Building, 100 Mount Laurel Road. (856) 234-0001. Pemberton Township Council. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Pemberton Municipal Building, 500 Pemberton-Browns Mills Road. (609) 894-8201.
Cape May County
Cape May Court House Computer classes. Wednesday from 9 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. Cape May County Library, 30 Mechanic Street. Registration required. (609) 463-6341.
Essex County

Belleville Transportation Board. Tuesday at 6 p.m. Belleville Town Hall, 152 Washington Avenue. (973) 450-3310. Millburn Township Committee. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Millburn Town Hall, 375 Millburn Avenue. (973) 564-7000. Newark Municipal Council. Wednesday at 12:30 p.m. Newark City Hall, 920 Broad Street. (973) 733-3600.
Hudson County

Hoboken City Council. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hoboken City Hall, 94 Washington Street. (201) 420-2070. Jersey City Board of Chosen Freeholders. Thursday at 6 p.m. Hudson County Municipal Building, 567 Pavonia Avenue. (201) 795-6001. Weehawken Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Weehawken Town Hall, 400 Park Avenue. (201) 319-6005.
Hunterdon County

Baptistown Township Committee. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Kingwood Town Hall, Route 519 and Oak Grove Road. (908) 996-4276. Flemington Mental Health Board. Monday at 7 p.m. County Services Complex, Route 31. (908) 788-1253. Mountainville Board of Health. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Tewksbury Township Municipal Building, 60 Water Street. (908) 439-0022.
Mercer County

Princeton Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5366. Trenton Public zoning meeting. Thursday from 7 p.m. to 9 p.m. Trenton Central High School-West Campus, 1001 West State Street. (609) 989-3610.
Monmouth County

Asbury Park Recreation Commission. Wednesday at 5 p.m. City Hall, 1 Municipal Plaza. (732) 502-5724. Brielle Board of Adjustment. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Brielle Borough Hall, 601 Union Lane. (732) 528-6600.
Ocean County
Toms River Board of Chosen Freeholders. Wednesday at 4 p.m. 101 Hooper Avenue. (732) 929-2005.
Passaic County
Paterson Planning Board. Wednesday at 7 p.m. 155 Market Street. (973) 321-1500.
Somerset County
Millstone Rabies clinic. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Department of Public Works Garage, 899 Perrineville Road. (732) 446-6774.
Sussex County

Newton Planning Board. Monday at 4 p.m. Sussex County Administrative Center, 1 Spring Street. (973) 579-0250. Newton Strategic Growth Advisory Committee. Wednesday at 3 p.m. Sussex County Administrative Center, 1 Spring Street. (973) 579-0250.
Union County

Berkeley Heights Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Berkeley Heights, 29 Park Avenue. (908) 464-2700. Fanwood Mayor and Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Fanwood Borough Hall, 75 North Martine Avenue. (908) 322-8236. New Providence Electronic equipment and automobile tire recycling. Saturday from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. Lucent Technologies, 600 Mountain Avenue. (908) 654-9889.
Warren County

Great Meadows Township Committee. Thursday at 7 p.m. Liberty Township Municipal Building, 349 Mountain Lake Road. (908) 637-4579. Hardwick Township Committee. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Hardwick Municipal Building, 40 Spring Valley Road. (908) 362-6528. Washington Borough Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Washington Municipal Building, 100 Belvidere Avenue. (908) 689-3600.
